mapper.insert: insert into user_${storeId} (id, name, username, password, phone, remark, disabled) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{username}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{remark}, #{disabled});
mapper.update: update user_${storeId} set name = #{name}, username = #{username}, password = #{password}, phone = #{phone}, remark = #{remark}, disabled = #{disabled} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM user_${storeId} AS u, role_${storeId} AS r, user_role_${storeId} AS ur, department_${storeId} AS d, department_user_${storeId} AS du, warehouse_${storeId} AS w, warehouse_user_${storeId} AS wu WHERE u.id = ur.user_id AND r.id = ur.role_id AND d.id = du.department_id AND u.id = du.user_id AND w.id = wu.warehouse_id AND u.id = wu.user_id;

SELECT u.id AS id, u.name AS name, u.username AS username, u.password AS password, u.phone AS phone, u.remark AS remark, u.disabled AS disabled, r.id AS roleId, r.name AS roleName, d.id AS departmentId, d.name AS departmentName, w.id AS warehouseId, w.name AS warehouseName FROM user_${userVo.storeId} AS u, role_${userVo.storeId} AS r, user_role_${userVo.storeId} AS ur, department_${userVo.storeId} AS d, department_user_${userVo.storeId} AS du, warehouse_${userVo.storeId} AS w, warehouse_user_${userVo.storeId} AS wu WHERE u.id = ur.user_id AND r.id = ur.role_id AND d.id = du.department_id AND u.id = du.user_id AND w.id = wu.warehouse_id AND u.id = wu.user_id LIMIT #{pageVo.page}, #{pageVo.pageSize};

SELECT u.id AS id, u.name AS name, u.username AS username, u.password AS password, u.phone AS phone, u.remark AS remark, u.disabled AS disabled, r.id AS roleId, r.name AS roleName, d.id AS departmentId, d.name AS departmentName, w.id AS warehouseId, w.name AS warehouseName FROM user_${storeId} AS u, role_${storeId} AS r, user_role_${storeId} AS ur, department_${storeId} AS d, department_user_${storeId} AS du, warehouse_${storeId} AS w, warehouse_user_${storeId} AS wu WHERE u.id = ur.user_id AND r.id = ur.role_id AND d.id = du.department_id AND u.id = du.user_id AND w.id = wu.warehouse_id AND u.id = wu.user_id and u.id = #{id};
select id, name, username, password, phone, remark, disabled from user_${storeId} where username = #{username} and password = #{password};
SELECT r.id, r.name FROM role_${storeId} AS r, user_role_${storeId} AS ur WHERE r.id = ur.role_id AND ur.user_id = #{userId};
